description: top image  people wearing hats with wraps around their upper bodies and over ther hats, holding palm fronds and flowers; pocession around a raised altar area with seated figures at LL and LR; other people carrying liturgical instruments UR; bottom image  men, women and children with dog seated around a table eating; woman at left carrying in a steaming plate of food; another group visible through window and doorway at right; matted and framed
title: The Procession of Palmes of the Portuguese Jews, and Jewish Entertainment during the Feast of Tabernacles
